are\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We successfully through multiple waves of technology change.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":25961,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d5203adc-f8a4-4613-9ff9-202034391dfc/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d5203adc-f8a4-4613-9ff9-202034391dfc/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d5203adc-f8a4-4613-9ff9-202034391dfc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":181},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":58264,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1b51e06a-cfb6-4453-af56-7b2ba288869a/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1b51e06a-cfb6-4453-af56-7b2ba288869a/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1b51e06a-cfb6-4453-af56-7b2ba288869a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":953,\"height\":389},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our journey began in 1993 with 3 developers, 1 small office and 1 client. Since then, EPAM has grown tremendously! Today we are at the forefront of some of the most exciting technological changes in the industry, and our story continues in the modern age of agile delivery, big data, machine learning and AI.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/feSEUmrul7A\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The only “Information Technology Services company” named to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fortune’s 100 Fastest-Growing Companies\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" list for 2019 and as one of only four companies to appear on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Forbes’ 25 Fastest Growing Public Tech Companies\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" list every year of publication since 2013, EPAM is committed to providing our global team of 41,150+ EPAMers with inspiring careers from day one. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAMers lead with passion, honesty, and think creatively. Our people are the source of our success and we value collaboration, try to always understand our customers’ business, and strive for the highest standards of excellence. No matter where you are located, you are joining a dedicated, diverse community that will help you unlock your potential.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Arkadiy
